mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_name as memberName, age, gender, phone, email, member_level as memberLevel, reg_Date as regDate from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pw=#{memberPw}
select count(*) from member where member_id=#{memberId}
select count(*) from member where member_Nickname=#{memberNickname}
select count(*) from member where email=#{email}

select member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_name as memberName, age, gender, phone, email, member_level as memberLevel, reg_Date as regDate from member where member_id=#{memberId} and email=#{email}
mapper.update: update member set member_pw = #{memberPw} where member_id =#{memberId}
update member set member_pw = #{memberPw}, member_name = #{memberName}, member_nickname = #{memberNickname}, age = #{age}, phone = #{phone} where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM as RNUM,n.* from (select r.rec_no as recNo, r.rec_title as recTitle, r.rec_writer as recWriter, r.read_count as readCount, filename as filename, filepath as filepath, board_class from RECOMMEND_BOARD r full outer join photo p on(p.board_class=2 and p.board_no=r.rec_no) where p.BOARD_CLASS=2 order by read_count desc )n)where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select ROWNUM as RNUM,n.* from (select t.item_no as itemNO, t.item_title as itemTitle, t.begin_date as beginDate, t.end_date as endDate, t.item_price as itemPrice, t.item_reg_date as itemRegDate, NVl((select avg(r.review_rate) from tour_review r where (r.item_no = t.item_no)), 0) as tour_avg, p.filename from tour t full outer join photo p on(p.board_no=t.item_no and p.board_class=4) where t.close_check=0 and p.board_no=t.item_no order by tour_avg desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
